mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, TITLE, QUESTION, STYPE, STYPENAME, OPER, OPERTIME, TOOPER, TOOPERTIME, ANSWER, STATUS, STATUSNAME, SLEVEL, CHECKRESULT, SCORES, CHECKDESCR, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, PUBLICFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, OPERTYPE, CONTENT, STATUSFLAG, MEMBER, CUSTOMERTYPE, CUSTOMERNAME from DB_TASKLOG where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
